metadata.name: HarmonyPiggy
metadata.description:
此卡用以纪念 WePiggy 跨链部署计划的第八步：登陆 Harmony。在性能卓越的和谐网络之中，探寻DeFi 领域的生财之道。持有此卡可获得由 WePiggy 加持的“和谐网络，生财有道”状态。This card is issued to commemorate the Eighth step of WePiggy's cross-chain deployment plan: Harmony. In Harmony's high-performance network, explore ways to make big money in DeFi. Holder of this NFT will be blessed by WePiggy with the buff of "Harmony Brings Wealth".
总量(Amount)：198 
品级(Level)：史诗(Epic)
